data.text: @RichardHanania Is that for sure why he does this? I assumed it was just so he looks more important and the other guys are more uncomfortable.
@RichardHanania Maybe, he's also 69 years old, and that may affect his perspective.
@RichardHanania He's older demographic . Could die if he gets it. Sensible precautions.
@RichardHanania You are pivoting quickly. Good move 👍🏻👍🏽👍🏿
@MorenoffDan @RichardHanania Haha yeah, 14th-17th century seems to be Putin's ideal.
@kafkaexport @RichardHanania There’s a reason we have the word “Kremlinology…”
@kafkaexport @RichardHanania The guy is publishing arguments for policy based on 14th-17th century history. Might not want to discard pre-revolutionary precedents.
@MorenoffDan @RichardHanania Khruschev is probably the only modern example that is kind of close to "leader eliminated by their inner circle during crises."
@MorenoffDan @RichardHanania So nothing since the days of the Tsars in other words.
